URGENT IMPORTANT- RE EMAIL 2.3 SENT IN ERROR
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},

Please arrive for your role as previously advised.
Please accept our apologies for any problems arising from this systems error.
If you have any queries please contact me on the number below.
Kind regards,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} 0207 921 4405 The Challenge Network
